incidents.name: Issues logging into Dropbox.

incident_updates.body: We are aware of issues logging in to Dropbox and are investigating.

incidents.name: Previewing files may not be working as expected

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
File previews and thumbnails may not be displaying as expected for some users. We are actively addressing this issue and will provide another update shortly as we work to resolve it swiftly.

incidents.name: Previewing large text files may cause issues in the Dropbox Android app.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.
Previewing large text files may cause the Dropbox Android mobile app to crash. We are working to fix the problem as quickly as we can. We’ll share another update shortly.

incidents.name: Uploading images with the iOS mobile app may produce an error message.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Uploading a large number of images with the Dropbox iOS mobile app may result in an error message. Users can upload fewer images at a time to avoid errors.
We’re aware of the issue and are working on it.

incidents.name: Intermittent issues with file upload and download

incident_updates.body: Users may have experienced intermittent errors with file upload and download that lasted for about 30 minutes (5:00 - 5:30 UTC). The issue has been identified and resolved.

incidents.name: 500 errors when using Paper

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
Users are experiencing 500 errors when accessing or using Paper. We are working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. Thank you for your patience.

incidents.name: Users may experience intermittent issues when accessing files.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring results.
Users may experience intermittent issues when accessing files. We are working to fix the problem as quickly as we can. We’ll share another update shortly.

incidents.name: Folder subscriptions may not be working as expected

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
Folder subscriptions may not be working as expected for some users. We are working to fix the problem as quickly as we can. We’ll share another update shortly.

incidents.name: Linux users experiencing sign-in errors.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
Linux users should no longer be experiencing issues with logging in. We are continuing to monitor and will update shortly.
Linux users experiencing sign-in errors. We are working to fix the problem as quickly as we can. We’ll share another update shortly.

incidents.name: Users may experience intermittent issues when accessing the website.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: We are currently experiencing a partial outage in Google editor

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to work with Google to find a resolution. Thank you for your patience.

We are currently experiencing a partial outage in Google editor. We are working with Google to find a resolution. We expect that some users may not be able to open some Word, Excel, .gdoc or .gsheet files in the Google editor until this is resolved.

incidents.name: Dropbox is not working as expected for some users

incidents.name: Some users may not be able to access .gdoc, .gsheet, .gslides documents right now, nor will they be able to open up Microsoft documents in the Google editor.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Some users may not be able to access .gdoc, .gsheet, .gslides documents right now, nor will they be able to open up Microsoft documents in the Google editor. We are aware and working to fix the problem as quickly as we can. We’ll share another update shortly.
